name: Dobbelsteen Monster
description:
Fierce battles of DICE and DEATH!

You are but a mere Monster Hunter, on their way to save the world

3 stand between you, and an infinite loop of the same encounter

FIGHT with GARLIC dice and OTHER ASSORTED ITEMS

an experience unlike any other, featuring

  • Dice
  • Assorted items
  • Music
  • Textures
  • and Monsters (:

Monsters include

  • Teethbane Jester
  • The Expanse
  • Duncan

(ps. turn off Lock/hide mouse pointer or else it'll hide your cursor away from your beautiful gaze. Fullscreen Recommended)
